name: Dragonic Overlord
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked a rear-guard, your opponent cannot call cards from their hand to (GC).[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit's attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.
flavor: The dragon of apocalypse carved its name into various annals of history.

name: Vairina Erger
effect: [overDress]－"Trickstar" (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC))[AUTO](Hand):At the end of the battle your "Trickstar" attacked a vanguard, if your vanguard is "Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana", [COST][Soul-Blast 2], [overDress] this card on your "Trickstar" on (RC) as [Stand], and [Counter-Charge 1]. [CONT](RC)/(GC):If this unit is in the [overDress] state, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Responding in the midst of the fierce battle to the prayers that echo like screams of grief.

name: Crimson Igspeller
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [Soul-Charge 1]. [ACT](Soul):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put this card into your drop], [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor:
Don't go burning out on me, alright?
'cause this ain't anywhere near max firepower yet!

name: Diabolos Jetbacker, Lenard
effect: [CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000, and when this unit would attack, it battles all of your opponent's units in a column. [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [Soul-Charge 1], and if your vanguard is "Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce", choose up to one card from your soul, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: Penetrating straight across the field, even after taking on the opponent's full power.

name: Cardinal Draco, Alviderd
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your World is Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +2000. If it is Abyssal Dark Night instead, it gets [Power] +5000. [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][retire a Shadow Army token], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Adapting to the night, howling at the night, and rejecting the night.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Perio Turquoise
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if two or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power] +5000. [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When your opponent's card imprisoned in your Prison is placed on (RC), that unit gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Target of search warrant found. Begin tailing and attempt to restrain.

name: Heavenly Bow of Edifying Guidance, Refuerzos
effect: [CONT](RC):If you persona rode this turn, this unit gets "Boost". [AUTO]Back Row (RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit [Stand] by a card's effect, [Stand] this unit.
flavor: I'm right behind you. You know the meaning of that, right?

name: Phantom Blaster Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose a card with "Blaster" in its card name from your soul, and you may call it to (RC).[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Retire three rear-guards], choose up to two of your opponent's rear-guards, retire them, and this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor: The abyss dragon written of in legends, declaring that there are times when despair surpasses the light.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Damainaru
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +5000. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit is chosen by your vanguard's effect, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll be borrowing a fragment of the king's power!

name: Rogue Headhunter
effect: [CONT](RC):If you played an order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), the next time you would Alchemagic an order and play it this turn, reduce that cost by [Counter-Blast 1]. (Reduce from the total cost. Does not [Counter-Charge] even if it becomes negative)
flavor: Hunting the heads of rogues, a rogue-like being that is scarier than rogues.

name: Blaze Fist Monk, Damari
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, retire it, and if your vanguard is "Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana", choose up to one grade 0 card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
flavor: We're here with you. Don't worry and go ahead!

name: Stealth Dragon, Togachirashi
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, you may put this card into your soul.
flavor: Aim and throw! Make full use of that wrist snap!

name: Dragritter, Iduriss
effect: [ACT](RC):If your opponent's rear-guard was retired this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform one of the following. ・This unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.・Put this unit into your soul, choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: The enemy has backed off… Now is the time to attack!

name: Cleave Muddler
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your vanguard is "Master of Gravity, Baromagnes", [COST][discard a card from your hand], this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, and if your soul has ten or more cards, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: More power! With more power, the likes of you won't...!

name: Legio Wildmaster, Darius
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you have three or more other rear-guards, [Power] +10000 instead of +5000.
flavor: Experienced wildmasters can control the pack with a snap of the whip.

name: Diabolos Madonna, Mabel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a vanguard, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "Triple Drive" until end of turn. (Drive check three times!)
flavor: We gotta increase the cards we have for attacking, right?

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Derii Violet
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if one or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit by a grade 2 or lower unit's attack until end of that battle.
flavor: To keep damage to a minimum. That is the reason for their actions.

name: Cardinal Noid, Thumborino
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a Shadow Army token, you may have this unit get [Power] +15000 until end of turn. If you do, at the end of that battle, retire all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and draw a card.
flavor: It's fine, priority goes to eliminating enemies.

name: Ravenous Monster, Marunorm
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a set order card from your hand], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: It sated its hunger for a bit. But immediately got hungry again.

name: Soaring Dragon, Prideful Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have four or more grade 3 rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card. If you persona rode this turn, you may have "this unit get [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn" instead of drawing a card.
flavor: The wings of pride and the knights are both aiming for a distant peace.

name: Sterilize Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have no face up cards in your damage zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Sterilization complete. Commencing operation.

name: Diaglass Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress" or "Pentagleam Sorceress", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], look at two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to two unit cards from among them, call them to (RC), and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.
flavor: Just a little is fine. Give me the power to see into the future!

name: Maiden of Deep Impression, Urjula
effect: [CONT](RC):When you would move or swap rear-guards during your main phase, you can also move it within the same row.[CONT](RC):Your unit in front of this unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.
flavor: The beautiful garden that you created. Replant it as your heart wishes.

name: Regurgitation from the Underworld
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1]!Choose any player's rear-guard, retire it, choose up to one card with the same grade as that card from your drop, and call it to (RC). If this is part of Alchemagic, you may choose up to two instead of one to call.
flavor: As the doors to the underworld opened, the reversal of life and death burst forth.

name: Wild Intelligence
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Discard three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card with the same grade as your vanguard or lower from your drop, and call it to (RC). If your vanguard is "Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia", you may choose up to two cards instead of one.
flavor: In order to survive, join forces and pool your knowledge.

name: Strong Fortress Dragon, Gibrabrachio
effect: [ACT](RC):If your vanguard is "Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene", [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](RC):At the beginning of your battle phase, if your opponent has one or less rear-guards, [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The great dragons walked steadfastly forward even when amidst the enemy camps.

name: Dragon Knight, Nehalem
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Overlord" in its card name, call this card to (RC).[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit and all of your vanguards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The empire's strongest dragon knight is renowned for defeating thousands.

name: Berserk Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or less rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: It is said that it pushed the limits of destruction until its life burned out.

name: Blaze Maiden, Tanya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 0 card from your drop, and call it to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your grade 0 units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Showered in the hopes of many, the egg was reborn with divinity.

name: Blaze Maiden, Parama
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Rino! Even if it's tough, it's no reason to cry and whine!

name: Horns of Blessing
effect: Play this with [COST][discard a card with the [overDress] ability from your hand]!Draw two cards.
flavor: At the break of dawn, Rino's group leaves with the egg on a journey to gather hope.

name: Time Jarett Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], and draw a card.
flavor: The zodiac time beasts entrusted all their powers to the great hero.

name: Diabolos Edge, Grantory
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1], until end of turn, your opponent cannot intercept, and if you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: The key to victory is not to give your opponent freedom of action.

name: Freeze Breeze
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, if your vanguard is "Master of Gravity, Baromagnes", [Soul-Charge 1], and if your soul has ten or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw two cards.
flavor: I recently heard. That it's important to have good footing.

name: Diabolos Girls, Natalia
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor:
We'll make the play, we're gonna score!
Our dynamic will take back more~!

name: Supernatural Extraction
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand]![Soul-Charge 3]. Then, if your soul has ten or more cards, choose a card from your soul, and you may put it into your hand.
flavor: It's time you returned what I had left with you.

name: Hellblast Full Dive
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC). Then, if you are in "Final Rush", all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: We'll settle it with this play! Don't hold back anything now!

name: Cardinal Noid, Plasteia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack boosted by a Shadow Army token hits, draw a card.
flavor: Over in this world, the likes of you are not needed.

name: Cardinal Fang, Marizma
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one World card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor: Analyzing an overwhelming amount of data, it predicts the arrival of the night.

name: Cardinal Prima, Ekolpa
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][retire a Shadow Army token], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: The key to controlling the night battle is technological supremacy.

name: Bizarre Beast, Bagumotor
effect: [ACT](RC):If one or less of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, [COST][[Rest] this unit], choose a unit card from your opponent's drop, and imprison it in your Prison.
flavor: Capturing devices meant for restraining gigantic enemies are kept inside as well.

name: Cardinal Draco, Enpyro
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Twisting causality. That you may not do as you please.

name: Moment of Capture! Aurora Battle Princess 24-hr Coverage!
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!If your opponent's hand has four or more cards, they choose a card from their hand, and imprison it in your Prison. If three or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: We've just witnessed the moment the crime syndicate was apprehended!

name: Exquisite Knight, Olwein
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to two cards from among them, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. [AUTO](RC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Will it go smoothly? That's where we work hard!

name: Darkness Maiden, Macha
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Then, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire another rear-guard], look at five cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 1 or less unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A callous command. For the sake of unwavering victory.

name: Blaster Dark
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire another rear-guard], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your rear-guard was retired this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: There was once a knight that wielded the blade of determination in the shadows of glory.

name: Witch of Pandering, Brunner
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, when this unit would be retired for your card's cost, it may be regarded as retiring two rear-guards.
flavor: As long as you wish for it, I will gladly offer them all.

name: Bard of Heavenly Song, Alpacc
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: In tough times, the heroic timbre supports the heart.

name: Form up, O Chosen Knights
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1]!Perform all of the effects below according to the number of your grade 3 units. ・2 or more - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. ・3 or more - Draw a card. ・4 or more - Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets drive +1 until end of turn.
flavor: To fulfill one's mission without fail. That is the oath of the knights.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Elrante
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if there are two or more units in front of this unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, and if there are three or more units, [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: The great heart nurtures the land, walking forth with hope in its chest.

name: Fleet Swallower
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you did Alchemagic an order this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: Pray that it does not target you. For all is lost once it does.

name: Fairy of Tragic Love
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, [COST][bind this unit], choose an order card from your bind zone, and add it to your hand.
flavor: The wails of the past bring forth the tragedy once more.

name: Sleeve Tugging Belle
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may put all of your cards from your bind zone into your drop. If you do, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card you put.
flavor: I've decided. I'll have you clear this accumulated grudge.

name: Frenzied Heiress
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Insanity can sometimes be a weapon.

name: Nectar of Sensationalism
effect: Choose one of your rear-guards, and until end of turn, it gets [Power] +5000 for every five cards in your drop, and if your drop has fifteen or more cards, it gets [Critical] +1.
flavor: Its not enough? Then I'll supplement with this.

name: Volcanicgun Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's front row has no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The tyrant of burnt fields leaves no survivors.

name: Crousrock Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and you may move it to one of your opponent's open front row (RC).
flavor: Its anger makes even the earth's crust tremble.

name: Dragritter, Nathil
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your opponent has two or less rear-guards, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Shooting at approaching foes is a skill at which I'm better than others.

name: Armored Dragon, Mountcannon
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When your grade 0 unit attacks, this unit and the unit that attacked get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The cannons on its back are able to send support fire in all directions.

name: Dragon Monk, Gojo
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the vanguard's attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: The high priest of the dragons devoted its life to the redemption of dead souls.

name: Stealth Dragon, Kizanreiji
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and retire it.
flavor: To stand before me, you must have a death wish.

name: Blaze Fist Monk, Enten
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: To protect the pure prayers, one must not forget to train one's body.

name: Blaze Maiden, Aruuna
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted a grade 0, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: The waltz of flames that delivers prayers must be taught to you as well!

name: Embodiment of Armor, Bahr
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Dragon Knight, Nehalem", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 1 card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard's attack hits, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: That armor is said to bring victory while losing one's calm heart.

name: Blaze Maiden, Zaara
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a "Blaze Maiden, Reiyu" or "Blaze Maiden, Rino" on your (VC) or (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: I'm not gonna fall behind either!

name: Lizard Runner, Undeux
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The youth discovered the hidden treasure of legends recorded in videos.

name: Flame Dragon Bombardment
effect: Choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your units can attack your opponent's back row rear-guard when they would attack.".
flavor: In the battlefield of dragons, there are no safe spots.

name: Prayers That Will Reach Someday
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!If you have a rear-guard with the [overDress] ability, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Believing as you continue to pray. That is the key to having your wish granted.

name: Steam Knight, Pashatatal
effect: [ACT](RC):If your soul has four or less cards, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Dark States is governed by the descendants of the great hero.

name: Spiracle Splasher
effect: [CONT](RC):If your vanguard is "Master of Gravity, Baromagnes", this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: By coming into contact with different disposition, the supernatural powers reaches new heights.

name: Diabolos Attacker, Arwing
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you are in "Final Rush", it gets [Power] +15000 instead of +5000.
flavor: From now til the end of the match, I'll not let you touch the ball!

name: Unbreakable Ice Pillar, Jebinna
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your soul has ten or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: If its not going to change the outcome, just die a dog's death here right now.

name: Steam Artist, Napir
effect: [CONT](GC):If your soul has five or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: The interdimensional rupture that rejects history. It may be possible to perceive the details.

name: Diabolos Madonna, Viola
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your vanguard is "Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce", [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: I can't show any pathetic plays when I'm before that person!

name: Pestilent Talon
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When your vanguard is placed, [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Repeatedly injecting weak poison, so as to mock their writhing form.

name: Monitoring Gear Dober
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Overcoming the rejection, the time brigade returns to their role as observers.

name: Cyclone Circler
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has five or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], choose three of your front row units, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (The [Power] gained from this unit's boost will be lost)
flavor: As the wind of killing intent swirls, flowers of blood form all around.

name: Steam Engineer, Peperi
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard, if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater cards from hand to (GC).
flavor: Time to be reckless I guess. Just for a bit.

name: Diabolos Boys, Chester
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: I hate to get tired, so I'll end this fast.

name: Deformed Hammer
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your soul has five or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: Seems like you won't understand unless I hit you with this.

name: Special "Violence" Yell
effect: Choose a "Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce" on your (VC) or (RC), and it gets [Power] +20000 until end of that battle.
flavor: With the burst of yells behind their back, the ace springs forth.

name: Cardinal Draco, Zelgio
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire a Shadow Army token], and until end of that battle, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: The remaining few good machines. We must stop it no matter what.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Mel Horizon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, imprison it in your Prison, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: To cooperate or to resist, which do you prefer~?

name: Hardfist Dragon, Metalknuckler Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If you persona rode this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Its finishing blow shakes even the galaxy.

name: Twisting Bulldoze
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if the number of your rear-guards is more than your opponent's, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: We have the advantage! Break through in one go!

name: Cardinal Fang, Estrett
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of each turn, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, both you and your opponent choose one of your own rear-guards, and retire it. (The turn fighter chooses the unit to retire first)
flavor: The weak perish. That is even more apparent in the night.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Birett Canary
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's cards imprisoned in your Prison, and put it into their drop.
flavor: Just apprehending them, don't you think that's lenient?

name: Harming Bite Monster, Zabocanni
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, if this unit was boosted, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: Its nature is to release seeds once it secures its food.

name: Cardinal Prima, Altepo
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your World is Dark Night, [Soul-Charge 1]. If it is Abyssal Dark Night, [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: The night that never ends. It may really exist.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Roudend Azalea
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle that this unit boosted, if two or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Preparations all okay~. You can turn into ash at any time.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Wapper Plun
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if five or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, [Counter-Charge 1] or [Soul-Charge 3].
flavor: Suspicious people will be arrested! No need for hesitation!

name: Spinvac Robo, Ramroot
effect: [CONT](RC):If your Order Zone has a Set Order, this unit gets "Intercept".
flavor: I know its reckless! But the invasion has to be stopped!

name: Explosive! Melting Heart!
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!Choose one of your opponent's attacking units, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn for each of your opponent's cards imprisoned in your Prison. (It will not be retired even if its [Power] becomes negative）
flavor: Your heart will be captured way before you are handcuffed.

name: Eclipsed Moonlight
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![AUTO]:When this card is put into the Order Zone, call a Shadow Army token to your (RC). (Shadow Army has [Power] 15000 and Boost）[CONT]Order Zone:If your order zone only has World cards, the following effects are active according to the number of cards in your order zone.・1 card ‐ Your World becomes Dark Night.・2 or more cards ‐ Your World becomes Abyssal Dark Night.
flavor: Eating into the little light remaining, the night grows deeper.

name: Virulence Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) for the cost of your card, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and all of your units with "Blaster" in their card names get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The feeling of regret changes into the blade of revenge.

name: Octadevote Sorceress
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, if your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress", [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1] or [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: There is value in betting on it one more time.

name: Heavenly Staff of Kind Intention, Colthese
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is revealed for your drive check, you may call this card to an open (RC). If you do, this unit gets "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: I will bear your determination along with you.

name: Heavenly Blade of Sublime, Bethida
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & Soul-Blast 1], choose a column, and your opponent puts all of their rear-guards in that column on the bottom of their deck in any order.
flavor: Go on ahead. I'll take on the hindrances!

name: Divine Sister, Petit Four
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have three or more grade 3 units, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: The knights fulfill their duty. Within the shadows where none perceive.

name: Knight of Heavenly Destruction, Kapald
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Rest] one of your other rear-guards], reveal the top card of your deck, put it into your hand if it is an order card or grade 3 card, and call it to (RC) if it isn't.
flavor: We have arrived. There's no need to worry any more.

name: Additional Angel
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Put this unit in your damage zone], choose a face up grade 3 card from your damage zone, and call it to (RC).
flavor: Providing aid to anyone. As long as they are injured.

name: Advancement Magic, Melcoco
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Witches of the new era inherit their predecessors' names etched in legends.

name: Knight of Heavenly Roar, Reedy
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 2], and until end of turn, the [Power] increase of trigger effects revealed for your drive check get +5000.
flavor: Swinging with full force. That is why sometimes, it gets blown away.

name: Blaster Javelin
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Blaster Dark", reveal the top card of your deck, call it to (RC) as [Rest] if it is a unit card, and discard it if it isn't.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: There are things that the light cannot accomplish. And they know of this.

name: Black Sage, Charon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, [COST][[Rest] this unit], look at the top card of your deck, and if it is a unit card, you may call it to (RC). At the end of that turn, retire that called unit. (Put it on the top of your deck if you did not call)
flavor: The sages seek answers to reality, for they despise the emptiness of ideals.

name: Fullbau
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The resurrected image depicts the fierce battle between the apocalypse and the abyss.

name: Noble Will
effect: If you have three or more grade 3 units, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +20000 until end of that battle. (Includes (GC) too)
flavor: This is just the midpoint. We can't fall here yet.

name: Shieldfisher Dragon
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):This unit can only attack if you called rear-guards other than from hand this turn.
flavor: If you wish for more war achievements, you must first understand your power.

name: Iron Anchor Resentment Dragon
effect: [CONT](VC):When you would play a normal order, you can bind a normal order with the same card name from your drop, and Alchemagic. （Combine the costs, and add the effect to the back!)
flavor: The humiliation from that day, I'll return it with anger to you!

name: Coffin Shooter
effect: [ACT]Drop[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Bind an order card from your drop], and call this card to an open (RC).
flavor: Death seeps out from the floor, and shoots to kill those who remains silent.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Bojalcorn
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, this unit gets "[CONT]Back Row (RC):When this unit would attack, this unit battles all of your opponent's front row units.".
flavor: Usually well-behaved. When excited, it might get a little dangerous.

name: Indiscriminate Shooting Mutant, Barretwasp
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit can intercept from the back row.
flavor: There's quite a bit of distance? None of my business.

name: Roaring Pistil, Langeena
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have a total of three or more order cards in your drop and bind zone, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: This rings out like the roar of a tiger, so it surprises everyone.

name: Promised Brave Shooter
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your other rear-guards.
flavor: This one shot is for the sake of everybody.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Tealuf
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be rode, called, nor moved to the front row.
flavor: I'll definitely not let you have this spot.

name: Lady Demolish
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, you may discard five cards from the top of your deck.
flavor: Blowing them up one after another. Even blowing up its own base.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Bilber
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Retire this unit], look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one unit card from among them, call it to a back row (RC), and discard the rest. That called unit cannot move to other (RC) until end of turn.
flavor: It is the type to start eating from the most tasty one.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Croucotte
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your rear-guards.
flavor: Overflowing with vitality and lively. It loves such ambience.

name: Harvesting Season
effect: Until end of turn, all of your back row rear-guards get [Power] +5000, and your rear-guards cannot move to other (RC) nor boost.
flavor: The sylvan horned beasts control its growth. To make it taste a little sweeter.

name: Overcoming the Unnatural Death
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Bind this card, choose up to two order cards from your drop, and put them into your hand.
flavor: Never giving up. That should have been you.

name: Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the start of your Ride Phase, until end of turn, you "Final Rush".[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Soul-Blast 5], and [Stand] all of your front row rear-guards.

name: Apex Ruler, Bastion
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your grade 3 units get [Power] +2000. [AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that your drive check revealed a grade 3, [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your rear-guards, [Stand] it, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Strong Fortress Dragon, Gibrabrachio
effect: [ACT](RC):If your vanguard is "Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene", [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](RC):At the beginning of your battle phase, if your opponent has one or less rear-guards, [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Dragon Knight, Nehalem
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Overlord" in its card name, call this card to (RC).[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit and all of your vanguards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Berserk Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or less rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Blaze Maiden, Tanya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 0 card from your drop, and call it to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your grade 0 units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Blaze Maiden, Parama
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.

effect: Play this with [COST][discard a card with the [overDress] ability from your hand]!Draw two cards.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and you may move it to one of your opponent's open front row (RC).

effect: [AUTO](RC):When the vanguard's attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], and draw a card.

effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1], until end of turn, your opponent cannot intercept, and if you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Diabolos Girls, Natalia
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.

name: Supernatural Extraction
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand]![Soul-Charge 3]. Then, if your soul has ten or more cards, choose a card from your soul, and you may put it into your hand.

name: Hellblast Full Dive
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC). Then, if you are in "Final Rush", all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Steam Knight, Pashatatal
effect: [ACT](RC):If your soul has four or less cards, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Monitoring Gear Dober
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has five or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], choose three of your front row units, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress" or "Pentagleam Sorceress", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], look at two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to two unit cards from among them, call them to (RC), and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Maiden of Deep Impression, Urjula

effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1]!Choose any player's rear-guard, retire it, choose up to one card with the same grade as that card from your drop, and call it to (RC). If this is part of Alchemagic, you may choose up to two instead of one to call.

name: Wild Intelligence
